item.title: Introduction to Javascript
item.description: Data Types Javascript has 6 primitive data types number string boolean undefined null Symbol Objects Objects can store collection of data types, called properties. Each property has a key and value key is of string data types and value can be of any data type. If a value is a functon, its called as a method Equality in Objects == or === only tests if both operands are same objects.
